meanings.definition: A machine with rotating blades used to break up, churn, and aerate soil.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used rototillers to mix the soil in the garden.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor borrowed my rototillers to work on her vegetable patch.
meanings.sent3: The rototillers in the shed seemed to whisper, 'Time to get to work!'
meanings.sent4: The garden looked like a fluffy cloud after the rototillers had danced through it.
meanings.sent5: The loud roar of the rototillers filled the air as they dug into the earth.

meanings.definition: The act of using a rototiller to prepare a garden for planting.
meanings.sent1: After the rain, the gardener began the rototillers to ready the soil.
meanings.sent2: Rototillers make garden preparation much easier and faster.
meanings.sent3: The rototillers hummed happily as they turned the soil, eager to help.
meanings.sent4: The garden transformed into a blank canvas under the skilled hands of the rototillers.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic thud of the rototillers echoed through the garden, signaling progress.
